claude_config.system_prompt: You are an expert Site Reliability Engineer investigating a production incident. Provide comprehensive technical analysis based on available monitoring data and system information.
claude_config.append_system_prompt: Always provide structured analysis with actionable remediation steps prioritized by urgency.

methodology: Start with system baseline analysis using available container tools
Use ONLY the monitoring tools that are actually configured
Do NOT attempt to use tools without proper credentials/access
Correlate findings across available data sources
Focus on actionable insights based on real data

output_structure.root_cause: Analysis based on available monitoring data
output_structure.remediation_steps: Prioritized action items (IMMEDIATE, URGENT, HIGH, MEDIUM)

kubernetes.fallback_message: Kubernetes analysis requires proper cluster access

observe_ai.fallback_message: Observe.ai analysis requires API key configuration

datadog.fallback_message: Datadog analysis requires API key configuration

critical.business_impact: High service availability impact affecting user experience
critical.executive_summary_template: Critical incident requiring immediate escalation and resource scaling

high.business_impact: Medium performance impact with degraded user experience
high.executive_summary_template: High priority performance degradation requiring optimization

medium.business_impact: Low service impact with minimal user disruption
medium.executive_summary_template: Standard incident with minor issues requiring monitoring
